description:
We already know that The Walking Dead's Season 6 finale is going to be long and dark. Now, if a new report from Spoil the Dead via HNGN is to be believed, it's going to end on a cliff-hanger as well.我们都知道，《行尸走肉》第六季的季终集是超长集，也必定非常黑暗。我们也知道，第六季的季终会给我们留下巨大的悬念。

It's no secret that Negan (Jeffrey Dean Morgan) is going to kill someone with his barbed-wire-wrapped baseball bat. In the comics, it was Glenn, but it could be someone else on the show. In the finale, a group of heroes including Rick (Andrew Lincoln), Michonne (Danai Gurira), Maggie (Lauren Cohan), Glenn (Steven Yeun) and Daryl (Norman Reedus), is captured and Negan plays "a sickening game of 'eeny, meeny, miny moe'" with his captives before deciding on who's going to bite the dust. But apparently when he swings the bat, the camera switches to the victim's point of view and we don't see who it is. So fans will be left to speculate for the next several months in a repeat of Game of Thrones' interminable "Is Jon Snow dead or not?" offseason.大反派Negan出场会杀掉某个角色是肯定的。在原著漫画中，这个角色是Glenn，但是在电视剧中这个角色则可能是别人。在季终集中，Rick、Michonne、Maggie、Glenn、Daryl组成的英雄团队被抓，并且被逼跟Negan玩《尹尼,米尼,迈尼,莫》的游戏来决定到底谁死。不过游戏开始之后，镜头转换成了反派的视角，我们看不到这个人是谁。所以粉丝们不得不苦等几个月后的新季开播才能知晓答案。这根《权力的游戏》玩了整整一年“Jon Snow到底死没死”的梗一样。

The Walking Dead's Season 6 finale airs Sunday, April 3 at 9/8c on AMC, but we have one more week to go before we get there.《行尸走肉》第六季新的 一集将会在4月3日播出，这集之后就会是万众期待的第六季季终集了！
